scripts.build:prod:chrome: cross-env NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=4096" npm run build:chrome
scripts.build:prod:edge: cross-env NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=4096" npm run build:edge
scripts.build:prod:firefox: cross-env NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=4096" npm run build:firefox
scripts.build:prod:opera: cross-env NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=4096" npm run build:opera
scripts.build:prod:safari: cross-env NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=4096" npm run build:safari
scripts.dist:chrome: npm run build:prod:chrome && mkdir -p dist && ./scripts/compress.ps1 dist-chrome.zip

scripts.dist:firefox: npm run build:prod:firefox && mkdir -p dist && ./scripts/compress.ps1 dist-firefox.zip
scripts.dist:opera: npm run build:prod:opera && mkdir -p dist && ./scripts/compress.ps1 dist-opera.zip
